Package cams.camp

Interface CampRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
UnifiedCampRepository
public interface CampRepository
Interface defining the repository actions for managing camps. Provides methods for adding, retrieving, deleting, and querying camps.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCamp(Camp camp)
    Adds a new camp to the repository.
    List<Camp>
    allCamps()
    Retrieves a list of all camps in the repository.
    void
    deleteCamp(String campName)
    Deletes a camp from the repository by its name.
    boolean
    Exists(String name)
    Checks if a camp with the specified name exists in the repository.

    Retrieves a list of camps filtered by the specified faculty.

    Retrieves the size of the repository.

    Retrieves a camp by its name.

  • Method Details

    • Exists

      boolean Exists(String name)
      Checks if a camp with the specified name exists in the repository.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the camp to check.
      Returns:
      true if the camp exists, false otherwise.

    • filterCampByFaculty

      List<Camp> filterCampByFaculty(Faculty faculty)
      Retrieves a list of camps filtered by the specified faculty.
      Parameters:
      faculty - The faculty to filter the camps by.
      Returns:
      A list of Camp objects that belong to the specified faculty.

    • allCamps

      List<Camp> allCamps()
      Retrieves a list of all camps in the repository.
      Returns:
      A list of all Camp objects.

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the repository is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the repository contains no camps, false otherwise.

    • addCamp

      void addCamp(Camp camp)
      Adds a new camp to the repository.
      Parameters:
      camp - The Camp object to add.

    • retrieveCamp

      Camp retrieveCamp(String campName)
      Retrieves a camp by its name.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Camp object if found, null otherwise.

    • deleteCamp

      void deleteCamp(String campName)
      Deletes a camp from the repository by its name.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp to delete.

    • getSize

      int getSize()
      Retrieves the size of the repository.
      Returns:
      The number of camps in the repository.
